snippet: A new independent movie, “Supercapitalist,” has updated the familiar villain of Wall Street greed with modern-day changes, like the rise of Hong Kong, as Asia is the center for wealth and success.
abstract: A new independent movie, “Supercapitalist,” has updated the familiar villain of Wall Street greed with modern-day changes, like the rise of Hong Kong, as Asia is the center for wealth and success.

headline.main: In 'Supercapitalist,' Wall Street Is Back as a Villain
